idea:
Green Recycling Engineers And Technologies Pvt. Ltd. (‚ÄòGREAT‚Äô) was incorporated on November 02, 2020 at ROC ‚Äì Mumbai

The Company has its registered office located at Huma Exhibitors, 1st Floor, Huma Mall, LBS Marg, Kanjur Marg (W), Mumbai ‚Äì 400078

The said Company is DPIIT recognized Start up Company

The Company is in the business of managing mixed Municipal Solid waste

The Company has designed a technology for mobile segregation of mixed solid waste, automatically in to 3 types of segregated waste i.e. Wet Waste, Mixed Plastic and Rejects. While Adapting to the Indian condition of the waste.

The said Technology is patented in the U.K.

The equipments and the systems are designed for engineering and safety by Danish Engineering Company and manufactured in India under Make in India Scheme, by Govt. of India.


The Company‚Äôs vision is to provide a end to end solution, management of mixed municipal solid waste, in Villages and Rural India, the solution to be provided by the Company is based on Criterias stipulated as per MSW solid waste rules, 2019 as well as in furtherance of Swachh Bharat Mission

Experienced Director: The directors have exposure in waste management business

Capable associates having vast experience in the field of collection and transportation of environment and landfill.

idea:

idea:
We are offering hospitality services with sustainable solutions. Our idea is to cater Travels and tours, Hotel and Catering industry, Maintenance Service using renewable sources causing minimal or no pollution. 


We are offering car rental and Delivery service using CNG or Electric vehicles only.


Our Maintenance service involves recycling of non degradable products and decomposition of degradable products.


Our hotel and Catering service offer packaging and serving of food in degradable utensils.


We are trying to make our services more and more sustainable as we can.

idea:
Our platform will power freelancing and self-job orientation, which will be utilized by both the Company/Client and the freelancer/ or Micro influencer. We focus on four principles for smooth working and improvement in the following fields:

Direct Contact: Direct contact of the company and the Freelancer/ Influencer with the team.

Work Environment: The freelancer can choose the work environment they are comfortable with. They can work from their home or even a caf√© as they prefer and oblige to complete the work in a given period.

Project distribution: Project distribution is completely on the basis of performance, skills, merits, and ratings.

Task Driven: Where the client can actually see the progress while communicating with the team if any changes or improvements are required.

We are striving to achieve equality for all those freelancers or job seekers who are not treated according to their talent and due to corporate politics are unable to reach the desired position. This helps us attain the pay scale stability that a person with skills should achieve on the basis of their talent and not the ranks that are determined by the people who control the system.

‚ÄúOur mission is to change how the world works together.‚Äù
name: PINNPOINTER PRIVATE LIMITED
